description:
Provides a resource to manage roles in an SSH secret backend
[SSH secret backend within Vault](https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/secrets/ssh/index.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AllowBareDomains.description: Specifies if host certificates that are requested are allowed to use the base domains listed in `allowed_domains`.

AllowHostCertificates.description: Specifies if certificates are allowed to be signed for use as a 'host'.

AllowSubdomains.description: Specifies if host certificates that are requested are allowed to be subdomains of those listed in `allowed_domains`.

AllowUserCertificates.description: Specifies if certificates are allowed to be signed for use as a 'user'.

AllowUserKeyIds.description: Specifies if users can override the key ID for a signed certificate with the `key_id` field.

AllowedCriticalOptions.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of critical options that certificates can have when signed.

AllowedDomains.description: The list of domains for which a client can request a host certificate.

AllowedExtensions.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of extensions that certificates can have when signed.

AllowedUserKeyLengths.description: Specifies a map of ssh key types and their expected sizes which are allowed to be signed by the CA type.

AllowedUsers.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of usernames that are to be allowed, only if certain usernames are to be allowed.

Backend.description: The path where the SSH secret backend is mounted.

CidrList.description: The comma-separated string of CIDR blocks for which this role is applicable.

DefaultCriticalOptions.description: Specifies a map of critical options that certificates have when signed.

DefaultExtensions.description: Specifies a map of extensions that certificates have when signed.

DefaultUser.description: Specifies the default username for which a credential will be generated.

KeyIdFormat.description: Specifies a custom format for the key id of a signed certificate.

KeyType.description: Specifies the type of credentials generated by this role. This can be either `otp`, `dynamic` or `ca`.

MaxTtl.description: Specifies the maximum Time To Live value.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the role to create.

Ttl.description: Specifies the Time To Live value.
